name: Hand to Hand
description:
A space snake game with randomly generated levels.

This was a challenge to make a game in 48 hours of labor or less using only art from the Kenney base platformer assets.

Arrow keys to move, Space to shoot.

F11 or Alt-enter toggles fullscreen.

Source available on GitHub.

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com): "Arroz con Pollo" and "Cuban Sandwich".
